title: nf-core/thriptic pipeline - params.input schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.lr_input

sample.errorMessage: Sample name must be provided and cannot contain spaces

bam.errorMessage: Alignment file must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.bam' or '.cram'

index.errorMessage: Index file must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.bam.bai' or '.cram.crai'

fastq.errorMessage: FastQ file must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fq.gz' or '.fastq.gz'

svs.errorMessage: SV file must be provided, cannot contain spaces, and must have extension '.vcf' or '.vcf.gz'

cnvs.errorMessage: CNV file must be provided, cannot contain spaces, and must have extension '.vcf' or '.vcf.gz'
